review: Pros:  1) Low Cost  2) Easy to use with either remote or with more fully-featured smartphone/tablet application.  3) Fast loading video over the Internet with little lag or flutter seen with some "smart" TV  4) With 5 GB, the Stick is upgradable and allows Fire apps to be installed for non-Amazon channels.Cons:  Very little.  Would be nice to have voice search via smartphone app, skip ahead on smartphone app (i.e. skip to specific time of video) etc.
